members.signatureBeforeChange: private void scandir(File dir, String vpath, boolean fast)
members.signatureAfterChange: private void scandir(File dir, String vpath, boolean fast)
diff: +             * two reasons are mentioned in the API docs for File.list
+             * (1) dir is not a directory. This is impossible as
+             *     we wouldn't get here in this case.
+             * (2) an IO error occurred (why doesn't it throw an exception
+            throw new BuildException("IO error scanning directory"
+            throw new BuildException("You must specify the " + archiveType + "file to create!");
